story:
Original Book on the Beatitudes

For the last three years, I have been studying the Beatitudes, the blessings that Jesus gave during the Sermon on the Mount. They can seem strange and even sappy to contemporary ears, or as small comforts to big problems. As I keep knocking and seeking and pressing in to understand them, I keep finding new and extraordinary dimensions of meaning and significance.

I have written about some of my reflections -- in fact, on each and every Beatitude, at the Huffington Post, where I am a frequent contributor. (See http://www.huffingtonpost.com/eric-simpson)

I have also talked about them one by one on my professionally produced podcast, "Seeking Peace". (http://ancientfaith.com/podcasts/seekingpeace)

Looking at the Beatitudes as a kind of ladder, an ascent, I have discovered some amazing things about spirituality and its fundamental relationship to the world. So I want to go more in depth and write a full-length book. The problem is that I have three kids, a low paying job, and lots of bills. I don't have the time, unless... 

You Help Fund My Project

I work right now as a freelance copy writer online, anonymously providing content for various websites. It does not pay much. I make about .015 cents per 425 word article, which comes to about $6 an article. I have to write a lot of those to take care of business at home. Most of the stuff I write is about criminal law, car insurance, chiropractic and holistic health, psychology and self-improvement, as well as a variety of other subjects.

My studies on the Beatitudes have already given me a lot of material, I just need time to write and put it together. The funding would replace the money I make writing online content. It would cover bills and help feed us this summer. I would rather be writing and getting paid for something interesting that may stimulate thought and action than writing about car insurance and human growth hormone for $6 a pop.

My Future Goals

I am also a non-traditional student, having recently returned to school after a 15 year hiatus to pursue a degree in Psychology. I will transfer to Southern Oregon University In Ashland in September of this year. My aspirations are to make a positive difference in the lives of others. That's why I am choosing Psychology. I care deeply about people, about culture and the world we live in, more than I do about ideology or religion for its own sake. I want to redeem myself in the next half of my life (assuming I live an average lifespan) and make a difference in the lives of other people, particularly the disadvantaged. I think this book, along with my educational pursuits would be a great starting point.

Why The Beatitudes?

I see the Beatitudes as being revolutionary. They are antithetical to conventional wisdom or common sense in our present culture. I also don't think they are mere rhetoric, but apply to almost every area of life. Whether we are talking about poverty and our attitudes towards money in a capitalist society, or how we care for those who have less, or our relationship to the earth, to matter itself and to ecology.

The Beatitudes are together like a manual that instructs us on how to "be peace", not just be at peace, but become peace so that peace can spread, and that peace comes from being rooted both in the life of God and in the physical world. My desire isn't to proselytize, but to present my understanding of the text as it relates to spirituality and the world we live in. 

My plan for the book is a very personal, reflective style, more like a memoir or an informal essay than a book of theology. The style will differ somewhat from the pieces I have published at the Huffington Post. My articles online are somewhat truncated just to get the basic points across. My plan for this book is write extremely well, conversationally and to make reading it a pleasure, not something that feels like a duty or obligation. I want to tell stories, not give homilies.

What if I Don't Meet the Funding Goal?

Any money will be used to write the book in lieu of writing SEO content. If I don't meet the goal, or only make $10, that money will be used for me to work on the book the amount of time it would take me to write $10 worth of chiropractic articles or car repair articles, or whatever. The book may take longer to complete, but anyone who funds it will reeieve their perks whether the funding goal is reached or not. Just later rather than sooner.

Regular Updates

If I am funded to write this book, I will initially submit it to a publisher who may be interested. If that does not pan out, I will publish it myself. Certain funding levels will recieve copies. Everyone who helps out will receive a special mention in the acknowledgements on the project website, where I hope to keep patrons updated on the book's progress, and even post sample segments as I write the book.

I know not everyone can contribute, but I am just asking fellow strugglers to send a small donation to get me started on this. I am very excited about the possibility of having the liberty to write about something that is very personal and important to me. And please do me a favor and spread the word! Share on your Facebook page, tweet on your Twitter!

story:
Chapter 1 author announced: Dai Manuel of www.DaiManuel.com

Introduction

Answer these few questions to discover if this book might just help YOU!

1.  Are you sick and tired of paying too much tax? 

2.  Are you looking for ways to pay less tax? 

3.  Are you sick of the way tax dollars are wasted on frivolous spending and greed? 

Did you answer YES to ANY of these questions? If you are human, I’m sure you did!

We have the solution! The ‘Tax Saving Bible | Ten Commandments of Tax Savings’ will give you real-life stories and examples of how you can SAVE MORE OF YOUR HARD EARNED TAX DOLLARS and keep more money in your pocket. Want to know how? Read on…

Why the name ‘Tax Saving BIBLE’?  A 'bible' is nothing more than an ‘authority on a subject’. This particular ‘bible’ will be the authority on saving taxes in Canada (US version coming soon). This book goes beyond the basic importance of a Canadian’s understanding that we simply pay too much tax. It dives into real life situations and stories of HOW you can save tax, and how many top rated industry professionals advise THEIR clients on how to save tax also. We are going to show you the tax saving tips that the CRA does NOT want you to know. With the help of our industry experts, we will uncover top tax saving strategies that can be used in your own life to save YOU ten's of thousands of tax dollars over your lifetime.  

Can we guarantee these tax savings?

Absolutely! Ever heard the expression ‘put your money where your mouth is’? Well, MrTaxes.ca is putting our dollars where our pen is, with our check book. The ‘Tax Saving Bible | Ten Commandments of Tax Savings’ is GUARANTEED to reduce your tax ratio or we will personally refund your money paid for this book with a hand written, hand signed cheque.  *Conditions apply (you must practice the commandments to qualify)

What makes MrTaxes.ca a credible source of information about taxes?

Not only do we have our industry experts who are contributing to this book as we speak, but we at MrTaxes.ca have many many years of combined personal tax experience in Canada. We believe we must put this knowledge into book format so it can be shared to all Canadians – empowering them to save as much tax legally as we can.

Did you know…

Canadians have an estimated $400,000,000,000 in unused RRSP contribution room on their Notices of Assessment.  This is one example of how we want to help.  If we leveraged a 400 Billion loan to lend to Canadians to maximize their RRSP contributions, the Federal Government would receive no personal income tax dollars and most likely go into receivership!  It is our right as Canadian Citizens and taxpayers to pay the least amount of tax required. That is one reason why our fore parents fought in war. We don’t want to bankrupt the Canadian Government, we just want to reduce the amount we pay to the minimum allowable by law.  You can contribute by joining our petition to end personal income tax in Canada.  It is one of our offers!

What we need ($) , and what you will get in return (knowledge!):

As many of you are aware, publishing a book is not free! We need to reach a financial goal in order to get our book published. This will allow us to get the book published at a reasonable cost with a self publisher. We have chosen www.indiegogo.com as our platform of choice because it will leverage our books exposure to the taxpayers who need it the most.

Remember: Our goal is to enable EVERY SINGLE READER to pay the LEAST AMOUNT OF TAX possible by law.

How can you help us achieve our goal? Simple!

allowable by law.  You can contribute by joining our petition to end personal income tax in Canada.  It is one of our offers!

story:
He first got involved in poetry in 2013, starting his own open mic night in a pub called Inn Deep.

He has been writing and performing poetry for four years, amassing a small collection of poems.

Pure Toilet has been fully illustrated by Dario D’Alatri, edited by Calum Rodger and is ready to print. 130 pages. 24 poems.

 

The £2,000 goal will go towards printing the books, paying everyone that’s been involved and starting a brand new Glasgow publishing company called Speculative Books.

Speculative Books is a new publishing project from The Speculative Bookshop.  Looking to promote new writers, poets and artists.

story:
¿Por qué Emily?

Aunque ahora trabajo como Consejera con niños y jóvenes, hace muchos años me desempeñé como Redactora de Textos. Precisamente, y gracias a esa experiencia, pude ver más de cerca la cantidad de mensajes distorsionados que nos envían a través de los medios de comunicación. Por desgracia, muchos de estos mensajes van dirigidos a la mujer con la intención de presionarnos para cumplir con unas expectativas falsas de felicidad, éxito y autorrealización. Qué mayor inspiración que esa para querer darle vida a un proyecto que transmitiera un mensaje diferente... de inclusión, aceptación y celebración de todo lo que significa ser mujer. Es una plataforma necesaria para dar a conocer lo que estamos haciendo, para inspirar a otras, para conectar y celebrar nuestras pasiones. 

Al donar a esta campaña estás ayudando a escribir una historia diferente. Eres parte de un movimiento de mujeres que queremos cambiar el discurso. 

 

¿Cuáles son nuestros planes?

1. Lanzar nuestra 4ta edición para principios de año (2017)  y  distribuir  la revista entre más puntos de ventas. Queremos llegar a más mujeres.

2. Pagarle a nuestro equipo de trabajo (escritoras, ilustradoras, fotógrafas, Etc.)

3. Diseñar un website para mantenernos conectadas con nuestra comunidad

4. Crear una serie de eventos para conocer a todas la amigas de Emily y que podamos compartir e intercambiar experiencias. 

 

¿Por qué te necesitamos?

Si algo he aprendido en este proceso es que no podemos hacer las cosas solas. Siempre, siempre, siempre vamos a necesitar ayuda de otros. ¡Y eso está bien! Es enriquecedor cuando nos juntamos y trabajamos en equipo por un mismo fin. 

Necesitamos de más personas que crean que es hora de cambiar el discurso que hay en contra de la mujer. Necesitamos de gente que considere que las niñas deben crecer sintiéndose libres, felices y capaces. Necesitamos una sociedad que valore a las mujeres por lo que son, no por su apariencia. Necesitamos que nos ayudes a mantener viva la voz de Emily.

Emily tiene tres ediciones hermosas. En cada una se destaca una variedad de trabajos realizados por mujeres, aparte de otros temas de interés. Nuestra cuarta edición está casi completada, pero necesitamos tu ayuda para dar el próximo paso. 

 

Retos

Sabemos que estamos enfrentando muchos retos como sociedad, pero no podemos dejar nuestros sueños en el aire. Ahora más que nunca queremos crear cosas bellas para el mundo. No hay mejor forma para transformar lo que está sucediendo que a través de nuestros talentos y sabemos que Emily, aparte de ser una voz necesaria, es una voz que muchas mujeres necesitan escuchar. 

 

Ninguna ayuda es poca 

Contamos con tu apoyo. Por favor, no pienses que tu ayuda no hace la diferencia, porque ¡la hace! Comparte nuestras campaña para que podamos llegar a más personas. Únete a Emily y ayúdanos a escribir una historia diferente.

story:
What can you do with your InspireVision creations?

The online magazines and presentations that you create with InspireVision are full-screen, reside on the cloud, and run everywhere - on desktops, laptops, palmtops, tablets and smartphones, whether you have Mac, Windows, Linux, iOS or Android. They're integrated into your website, which you brand and customize to your needs.

Design and Publish

Your online magazines and presentations are full-screen, full-width, container-size or fixed size, and you embed them into your posts and pages.

The magazine pages are interactive and contain text, images, videos, hot-spots, buttons and HTML/apps.

Brand and Customize to Your Needs

Branding is important: use your own domain name that people remember, and visually customize the look-and-feel of the headings, bullet points, and other on-page elements.

Sign-up and Manage Your Subscribers

Protect your magazine issues and other premium content with membership levels (for example, Visitors, Gold and Platinum members). Assign subscription plans (for example, Monthly and Annual subscriptions). Issue coupons. Allow only your subscribers to access your protected posts and pages.

Secure Sockets Layers - SSL

Turn your pages and posts from http to https with one click. Protect sensitive data and give your subscribers and clients the peace of mind.

Multi-monetize Your Magazines

Collect subscription payments.

Add sponsored content and advertisements to your magazine pages.

Expand your offer by selling digital or physical products and give your customers a first-class shopping experience. Supports all major payment gateways including PayPal Express, PayPal Payflow Pro, Google checkout, 2checkout, Authorize.net AIM, Cubepoints, Moneybookers, eWay shared payments, Simplify Commerce by MasterCard, Stripe, and more.

Create multiple variations of your products, issue coupons, and easily handle shipping, sales and specials. Get more stats via full Google Analytics eCommerce integration.

Partner-up with Others

Your magazine increases the value for other sites in your industry - partner up with them and get featured on their pages in exchange for shared profits. Full affiliate management: your partners can see the clicks, free and paid sign-ups, and the commissions that they're generating.

Run Social Media Promotions

Automatically reveal a piece of your valuable content for free - in exchange for people promoting you on Facebook, Twitter and Google+.

Allow people to make comments on your posts and pages with their social media accounts - which at the same time promotes you to their social circles at Facebook, Twitter and Google+.

Add gravatar and emoticon-enabled Chat to your site. Use it to answer pre-sale or support questions. Allow users to chat to build the community. Let people login with the account they have with you, or with their Twitter, Facebook, or Google+ accounts.

Give your visitors the power of Digg and let them vote on your content. View the voting stats. Display the top posts by the popular vote.

Build Trust and Value with Ongoing Communication

Send newsletters to your subscribers.

Send sequences of automated messages to your subscribers.

Engage your visitors

Engage your visitors in discussions and in spending more time on your site with the simple but highly-functional Forum with topics, posts and search facilities. Add forums to any post or page in seconds with a shortcode.

Opt-in People into Your Mailing Lists

Animated opt-ins give you the rapid and reliable way to build your list of prospects. They combine images, videos, and text, look terrific, and get displayed with a click or automatically after the amount of time that you specify has passed. Allow people to opt-in with their social media accounts.

Easily add Facebook Like, Google+, Twitter Tweet, and LinkedIn Share buttons to your pop-ups. Create unlimited number of A/B testing campaigns, and use stats to choose the best popup for your purposes. Track "show" and "subscribe" events with Google Universal Analytics.

Fly Solo or Work with a Team

Use Internal Messaging to communicate with the other members of your team or with your customers and subscribers. Easy-to-use inbox for managing your messages with the instant email notification of new messages.

Use Appointments on your site to manage your entire team, or accept the bookings with your clients and collect payments with PayPal. Send confirmation and reminder emails. Allow clients to make the bookings up to one year in advance.

Manage Events

Easily organize your events - think of Facebook Events, but with twice as much functionality. Sell tickets to your event and accept payments via PayPal in all major currencies. Allow Facebook and Twitter login, and let your guests RSVP using their social media accounts. Easily give directions with integrated Google Maps.

Display event attendees, upcoming events, most popular events, event countdown, and more. Easily handle recurring events, auto-scheduling, or events with the limited capacity.

Create the Community

Build the entire communities with their own discussion boards, user lists, dashboards, wikis and messaging. Make the communities public or private. Allow your users to create their own communities. Have your own private Wikipedia!

Your Visitors and Your Magazine Subscribers

To control who can and who cannot view your magazine issues and other premium content, specify the Membership Levels (e.g. Visitor, Silver, Gold, Platinum...) and the Access Levels (e.g. Weekly, Monthly...).

Get involved, join us, and shape the future with online magazines

InspireVision in no longer just a dream - the release date is just around the corner. The funding raised on IndieGogo is to be used for the following:

  • Coding
    The full integration of InspireVision subsystems.
  • How-to Training Videos
    Using InspireVision is intuitive. Nevertheless, the step-by-step videos save your time, give you a head start, and explain the advanced points.
  • Support
    The ticket-based and email support are in place right now. We'd love to organize the 24/7 live help so that you and others in the InspireVision community can get the support immediately.

The perks you receive fall under one of 3 different plans, PRESENTER, PUBLISHER and ENTERPRISE, depending on how you want to use InspireVision.

PRESENTER: ideal for experts, consultants and professionals

  • Design and Publish
    Create an unlimited number of online presentations and magazine issues, and protect them so that only your subscribers can see them.
  • Sign-up Subscribers
    To this aim you set the membership levels (e.g. Visitors, Gold...), and each level can have one or more subscription plans (e.g. Weekly, Monthly...).
  • Protect
    All InspireVision plans give you SSL - Secure Sockets Layers: turn your sensitive pages to https with one click, and give your subscribers and prospects a peace of mind.
  • Run Sales and Promotions
    For sales, time-limited and special promotions, you issue coupons, with the discounts that you specify.
  • Communicate
    Keep regular contact with your subscribers by sending them the newsletters and by putting them on autoresponders - sequences of automated messages.
  • Grow
    With every new issue of your magazine, your membership will grow, with people spreading the word of mouth. Speed up this process exponentially by automatically revealing a piece of your premium content for free - in exchange for people promoting you on Facebook, Twitter and Google+. In addition, allow your visitors to make comments on your posts and pages with their social media accounts, which at the same time promotes you on their social circles.

PUBLISHER: build an entire online portal around your presentations and magazines

  • Brand and Customize
    You start with the branding, which includes your own domain name, and the customizing of the look and feel of your new website.
  • Engage
    Engage people in discussions with the simple but highly functional forums - with topics, posts and search facilities. Add a forum to any post or a page in seconds with a shortcode.
  • Grow Your List
    Animated opt-ins give you the rapid and reliable way to build your list of prospects. They combine images, videos, and text, look terrific, and get displayed with a click or automatically after the amount of time that you specify has passed. Allow people to opt-in with their social media accounts. Easily add Facebook Like, Google+, Twitter Tweet, and LinkedIn Share buttons to your pop-ups. Create unlimited number of A/B testing campaigns, and use stats to choose the best popup for your purposes. Track "show" and "subscribe" events with Google Universal Analytics.
  • Expand Your Offer
    Combine your presentations and online magazines with the selling of digital or physical products and give your customers a first-class shopping experience. The e-commerce store supports all major  payment gateways. Create multiple variations of your products, issue coupons, and easily handle shipping, sales and specials. Get better stats via full Google Analytics eCommerce integration.

ENTERPRISE: create an entire community around your topic of interest

  • Build the Community
    Build the entire public or private communities with their own discussion boards, user lists, dashboards, wikis and messaging. Have your own private Wikipedia!
  • Events
    Easily organize your events - think of Facebook Events, but with twice as much functionality. Sell tickets to your event and accept payments. Allow Facebook and Twitter login, and let your guests RSVP using their social media accounts. Easily give directions with integrated Google Maps. Display event attendees, upcoming events, most popular events, the countdown, and more. Easily handle recurring events, auto-scheduling, or events with the limited capacity.
  • Teamwork
    Use Internal Messaging to communicate with the other members of your team or with your customers and subscribers. Easy-to-use inbox for managing your messages with the instant email notifications.
  • Appointments
    Use Appointments on your site to manage your entire team, or accept the bookings with your clients and collect payments. Send confirmation and reminder emails. Allow clients to make the bookings up to one year in advance.
  • Social Media
    Add gravatar and emoticon-enabled Chat to your site. Use it to answer pre-sale or support questions. Allow users to chat to build the community. Let people login with the account they have with you, or with their Twitter, Facebook, or Google+ accounts.
  • Voting
    Give your visitors the power of Digg and let them vote on your content. View the voting stats, and sisplay the top posts.

Where to Find Images for Your Magazines and Presentations?

We all need high quality images for our magazines, presentations, articles, web pages... and instead of paying thousands of dollars to stock image depositories, a very special perk, ImageFinder Pro, allows you to find for free the images you can modify and use, even commercially.

The lifetime access to Image Finder Pro is $97 - but you get it when you make the contribution of just $25 to the InspireVision campaign. No more paying for the images you need - ever!

Who We Are

With its mix of youth and experience, the C Point team is the force behind the innovative projects such as Animator Professional, the stop-motion animation engine, Antechinus C# Editor, the world's first-ever visual integrated environment for C# programing (published 2 years before Microsoft Visual Studio came to life), Platypus Multimedia Author, for the point-and-click design of apps that you build and modify while they are live and running... and now our by far the biggest project to-date: InspireVision, world's best for online magazines and presentations.

Dr. Alex Davidovic
Founder & CEO

Specialist for Visual User Interfaces, who brings his vision and deep expertise. Buffy (pictured) was the inspiration for Dr Alex's book "Underdog Marketing".

Jason Elliott
Software Architect

Highly experienced programmer with the passion for cutting-edge technologies - for any new vision, Jason can write the code to bring it to life.

Diana Davidovic
Marketing

Psychologist with Masters in Marketing from the age of 21, and the fountain of new ideas.

Vlad Krpan
Lead Web Designer

World-class web designer and developer with the eye for detail. When he is 'in the zone', Vlad works for 14 hours without stopping.

Steve Walsh
Project Manager

Master organizer, who gives our wild ideas a dose of reality, and ensures that everything gets done on time.

Bloopers

 

Other Ways You Can Help

You are a person of influence - tell your friends, family and coworkers about InspireVision by sharing this page, they'll be happy that you did.

 

Roadmap to Public Release

FAQ

Is InspireVision footage in the video for real? It seems too good to be true.

This says a lot about our great programming team :) Yes, all the screen capture video sequences are showing the actual InspireVision-made magazine pages and presentations. People who have seen the live demos tell us that InspireVision is the best magazine/presentation engine in the world, with no-one else offering anything that is even remotely close to it.

Where are the magazines and presentations actually stored?

Everything you create is stored in the cloud. The physical location: super-fast dedicated servers in the data center in Kansas City, United States.

Can I use my own domain for my InspireVision website?

Yes. Furthermore, you can easily customize the look-and-feel of the pages any way you want.

Can I embed the InspireVision presentations into the pages of my existing website(s)?

Yes. You do it the same way you'd embed a YouTube video, for example.

Do readers have to download the magazine issue before reading it?

No. Viewing the magazine issues is incredibly fast thanks to dedicated hosting, caching and the smart read-ahead feature.

Do I have to create a different magazine/presentation version for each device?

No. Different devices (iPad, smart phone, desktop monitor, laptop screen...) have different resolutions and aspect ratios, but InspireVision does an amazing job of auto-resizing the text, images, videos, animated effects, transitions and other elements, for the best match with the available device.

However, if you WANT to display different things on specific devices, you can. This is useful when you want to show something (a link, for example) that is specific for the given device (an iPad, for example). This is also useful when you want to reduce the amount of content you show on small devices such as smart-phones.

I'd like to see how to use InspireVision to create an animated slide/page, not just bits and pieces...

We hear you and here's the real-time video on how to create an into similar to the one we use for InspireVision videos.

Do I need to know HTML to change the look-and-feel of my InspireVision website?

Absolutely not! The entire InspireVision environment is designed so that you can do everything with the simple point-and-click, and drag-and drop.

I have a question, how can I reach you?

Is it a question about InspireVision features and capabilities? Please watch the videos on this page and read the FAQ first - they might already hold the answer.

Want to share how InspireVision is going to impact your life or how you're going to inspire others? Media inquiry? Question about perks? Some other inquiry?

...you can reach us at info@inspire.vision at any time, and we'd love to hear from you.

Allow Facebook and Twitter login, and let your guests RSVP using their social media accounts. Easily give directions with integrated Google Maps. 
 Display event attendees, upcoming events, most popular events, event countdown, and more. Easily handle recurring events, auto-scheduling, or events with the limited capacity.





Create the Community
Build the entire communities with their own discussion boards, user lists, dashboards, wikis and messaging. Make the communities public or private. Allow your users to create their own communities. Have your own private Wikipedia!


Your Visitors and Your Magazine Subscribers 
To control who can and who cannot view your magazine issues and other premium content, specify the Membership Levels (e.g. Visitor, Silver, Gold, Platinum...) and the Access Levels (e.g. Weekly, Monthly...).

Get involved, join us, and shape the future with online magazines
InspireVision in no longer just a dream - the release date is just around the corner. The funding raised on IndieGogo is to be used for the following:


Coding
    The full integration of InspireVision subsystems.

How-to Training Videos
    Using InspireVision is intuitive. Nevertheless, the 
  step-by-step videos save your time, give you a head start, and explain the advanced points.

Support
    The ticket-based and email support are in place right now. We'd love to organize the 24/7 live help so that you and others in the InspireVision community can get the support immediately.
The perks you receive fall under one of 3 different plans, PRESENTER, PUBLISHER and ENTERPRISE, depending on how you want to use InspireVision.
PRESENTER: ideal for experts, consultants and professionals



Design and Publish
  Create an unlimited number of online presentations and magazine issues, and protect them so that only your subscribers can see them. 

Sign-up Subscribers
  To this aim you set the membership levels (e.g. Visitors, Gold...), and each level can have one or more subscription plans (e.g. Weekly, Monthly...).

Protect
  All InspireVision plans give you SSL - Secure Sockets Layers: turn your sensitive pages to https with one click, and give your subscribers and prospects a peace of mind.  

Run Sales and Promotions
  For sales, time-limited and special promotions, you issue coupons, with the discounts that you specify.

Communicate 
  Keep regular contact with your subscribers by sending them the newsletters and by putting them on autoresponders - sequences of automated messages.

Grow
  With every new issue of your magazine, your membership will grow, with people spreading the word of mouth. Speed up this process exponentially by automatically revealing a piece of your premium content for free - in exchange for people promoting you on Facebook, Twitter and Google+. In addition, allow your visitors to make comments on your posts and pages with their social media accounts, which at the same time promotes you on their social circles.
PUBLISHER: build an entire online portal around your presentations and magazines


Brand and Customize
  You start with the branding, which includes your own domain name, and the customizing of the look and feel of your new website.

Engage
  Engage people in discussions with the simple but highly functional forums - with topics, posts and search facilities. Add a forum to any post or a page in seconds with a shortcode.

Grow Your List 
  Animated opt-ins give you the rapid and reliable way to build your list of prospects. They combine images, videos, and text, look terrific, and get displayed with a click or automatically after the amount of time that you specify has passed. Allow people to opt-in with their social media accounts. Easily add Facebook Like, Google+, Twitter Tweet, and LinkedIn Share buttons to your pop-ups. Create unlimited number of A/B testing campaigns, and use stats to choose the best popup for your purposes. Track "show" and "subscribe" events with Google Universal Analytics.

Expand Your Offer
  Combine your presentations and online magazines with the selling of digital or physical products and give your customers a first-class shopping experience. The e-commerce store supports all major  payment gateways. Create multiple variations of your products, issue coupons, and easily handle shipping, sales and specials. Get better stats via full Google Analytics eCommerce integration.
ENTERPRISE: create an entire community around your topic of interest


Build the Community
  Build the entire public or private communities with their own discussion boards, user lists, dashboards, wikis and messaging. Have your own private Wikipedia!

Events
  Easily organize your events - think of Facebook Events, but with twice as much functionality. Sell tickets to your event and accept payments. Allow Facebook and Twitter login, and let your guests RSVP using their social media accounts. Easily give directions with integrated Google Maps. Display event attendees, upcoming events, most popular events, the countdown, and more. Easily handle recurring events, auto-scheduling, or events with the limited capacity.

Teamwork
  Use Internal Messaging to communicate with the other members of your team or with your customers and subscribers. Easy-to-use inbox for managing your messages with the instant email notifications.

Appointments
  Use Appointments on your site to manage your entire team, or accept the bookings with your clients and collect payments. Send confirmation and reminder emails. Allow clients to make the bookings up to one year in advance.

Social Media
  Add gravatar and emoticon-enabled Chat to your site. Use it to answer pre-sale or support questions. Allow users to chat to build the community. Let people login with the account they have with you, or with their Twitter, Facebook, or Google+ accounts.

Voting 
  Give your visitors the power of Digg and let them vote on your content. View the voting stats, and sisplay the top posts.
Where to Find Images for Your Magazines and Presentations?
We all need high quality images for our magazines, presentations, articles, web pages... and instead of paying thousands of dollars to stock image depositories, a very special perk, ImageFinder Pro, allows you to find for free the images you can modify and use, even commercially.
The lifetime access to Image Finder Pro is $97 - but you get it when you make the contribution of just $25 to the InspireVision campaign. No more paying for the images you need - ever!

Who We Are
With its mix of youth and experience, the C Point team is the force behind the innovative projects such as Animator Professional, the stop-motion animation engine, Antechinus C# Editor, the world's first-ever visual integrated environment for C# programing (published 2 years before Microsoft Visual Studio came to life), Platypus Multimedia Author, for the point-and-click design of apps that you build and modify while they are live and running... and now our by far the biggest project to-date: InspireVision, world's best for online magazines and presentations.





Dr. Alex Davidovic
      Founder & CEO
Specialist for Visual User Interfaces, who brings his vision and deep expertise. Buffy (pictured) was the inspiration for Dr Alex's book "Underdog Marketing".





Jason Elliott
        Software Architect
Highly experienced programmer with the passion for cutting-edge technologies - for any new vision, Jason can write the code to bring it to life.





Diana Davidovic
Marketing
Psychologist with Masters in Marketing from the age of 21, and the fountain of new ideas.





Vlad Krpan
Lead Web Designer
World-class web designer and developer with the eye for detail. When he is 'in the zone', Vlad works for 14 hours without stopping.





Steve Walsh
        Project Manager
Master organizer, who gives our wild ideas a dose of reality, and ensures that everything gets done on time.


Bloopers

 
Other Ways You Can Help
You are a person of influence - tell your friends, family and coworkers about InspireVision by sharing this page, they'll be happy that you did.

  
Roadmap to Public Release

FAQ
Is InspireVision footage in the video for real? It seems too good to be true.
This says a lot about our great programming team :) Yes, all the screen capture video sequences are showing the actual InspireVision-made magazine pages and presentations. People who have seen the live demos tell us that InspireVision is the best magazine/presentation engine in the world, with no-one else offering anything that is even remotely close to it.
Where are the magazines and presentations actually stored?
Everything you create is stored in the cloud. The physical location: super-fast dedicated servers in the data center in Kansas City, United States.
Can I use my own domain for my InspireVision website?
Yes. Furthermore, you can easily customize the look-and-feel of the pages any way you want.
Can I embed the InspireVision presentations into the pages of my existing website(s)?
Yes. You do it the same way you'd embed a YouTube video, for example.
Do readers have to download the magazine issue before reading it?
No. Viewing the magazine issues is incredibly fast thanks to dedicated hosting, caching and the smart read-ahead feature.
Do I have to create a different magazine/presentation version for each device?
No. Different devices (iPad, smart phone, desktop monitor, laptop screen...) have different resolutions and aspect ratios, but InspireVision does an amazing job of auto-resizing the text, images, videos, animated effects, transitions and other elements, for the best match with the available device.
However, if you WANT to display different things on specific devices, you can. This is useful when you want to show something (a link, for example) that is specific for the given device (an iPad, for example). This is also useful when you want to reduce the amount of content you show on small devices such as smart-phones.
I'd like to see how to use InspireVision to create an animated slide/page, not just bits and pieces...
We hear you and here's the real-time video on how to create an into similar to the one we use for InspireVision videos.

Do I need to know HTML to change the look-and-feel of my InspireVision website?
Absolutely not! The entire InspireVision environment is designed so that you can do everything with the simple point-and-click, and drag-and drop.

I have a question, how can I reach you?
Is it a question about InspireVision features and capabilities? 
  Please watch the videos on this page and read the FAQ first - they might already hold the answer. Want to share how InspireVision is going to impact your life or how you're going to inspire others? 
  Media inquiry? Question about perks? 
  Some other inquiry?...you can reach us at info@inspire.vision at any time, and we'd love to hear from you.

story:
Hola mi nombre es Fabian Sanchez y para conocerme debes saber que me gustan las motos, viajar y la aventura, es por eso que hace años tenía en la mente la idea de recorrer América en moto. Así que hace 3 años tome la decisión de preparar ese viaje que hasta ese momento solo estaba en mi cabeza.

Después de mucho esfuerzo y ahorrar lo que creía necesario para el viaje, el 2 de febrero salí de mi hogar en Cáceres, España para hacer este sueño realidad. Recorrer América desde Ushuaia Argentina hasta Fairbanks, Alaska. Exactamente llegar al autobús donde murió Alex Supertramp, historia que se inmortalizo en la película Into the Wild. 

Sin embargo el trayecto a traído más de lo que esperaba más aventura, más emociones y lamentablemente más gastos de lo que imagine. Por lo que mi objetivo de llegar hasta Fairbanks, Alaska está en peligro de no cumplirse

Tu apoyo es importante para que juntos podamos llegar a Alaska. Conseguir los $4,000.00 es lo mínimo que necesito para terminar mi viaje y a  tiempo. 

Para ello puedes ayudarme haciendo tu donativo que represente alguna de las necesidades básicas que se me presentan o para darle un toque divertido al desafió os reto a que me retes. Bueno la idea es básica vosotros me indicas que reto os gustaría que hiciera y cuanto aportaras porque yo cumpla el desafío y listo.  Yo lo realizo. Estoy dispuesto a hacer casi cualquier cosa, pero no sean crueles, por favor. 

 

Otras formas en las que puedes ayudar

Tu apoyo en todo sentido es importante para mi, por lo que también puedes ayudarme con lo siguiente.
  • Seguir mi trayecto por www.facebook.com/fabianplanet
  • Compartir mi trayecto y apoyarme en la búsqueda de hospedajes o alimentación a precios accesible.
  • Contactarme con grupos de motociclistas de los lugares que voy a visitar, siempre es bueno saber que puedo contar con amigos en el camino por cualquier imprevisto.
  • Compartir esta campaña.

story:
I am a mum of three from London and I have written a children's book called Stay Away From The Lake. It is aimed at ages 3-6 years and is the story of a young fox who wants to go out to play on a snowy day. He is given permission by his mother to do so on condition that he follows a few rules. 

 I wrote this book on the toilet! In 2011 ( just about the only 'Me time' some of us parents get!)  and was inspired by seeing some children playing on a pond that had frozen over whilst out driving with my sons. My eldest son, who was eight at the time said to me "Mummy those kids are stupid, that's dangerous."  I agreed and a few days later in the loo my first book was written ( well, typed on my phone!) I didn't think of doing much with it for a while until I started letting others read it, all of  the responses have been positive and encouraging.  I recently found an illustrator via Skillpages and recieved some amazing illustrations that have dented the Christmas shopping fund but are completely worth it.

 " You can go, but just to the park, don't talk to strangers and be back before dark.  Take your scarf with you and for goodness sake! Be ever so careful and stay away from the lake."

I need to get my book out there; I feel it has everything to become and bedtime classic with little ones everywhere as well as a clear message. 

Any amount donated will be a great help, but if you are unable to do so, please share on your social media, take a selfie with your copy (once available) and share! Whatever you can do to spread the word will be much appreciated.

I know it won't be an overnight success especially as a first time author, but I'm in for the long haul!

Thanks for reading!

story:
Have you ever thought there was more to life than working for the weekends?
Do you seek a deeper connection to yourself or something greater? 

Hi, I'm Lou,

I went from a corporate workhorse to now a meditating life enthusiast. I just finished writing my first book, Find Your Truth- A Transformational Journey About Letting Go of Addiction and Finding Life's Purpose. 

The video gives a highlight of my story and what this book is about. Its purpose is to show an example of transformation and give the steps that anyone can achieve. It's raw, inspiring, and from the heart. 

I want to make this book available for pre-order to:

1. Help me pay for final production costs. 
2. Collaborate with 2 amazing organizations.

World Travelers Association- A Non-Profit organization who runs life changing adventure & yoga retreats focused around volunteering. 10% of the funds raised will be donated to help their cause. One of the perks offers an all inclusive paid retreat! Below is a picture from a beach cleanup in Morocco!

 

Live A Great Story- Media company who shares inspiring stories. Most of my perks include this T- Shirt to help you spread the inspiration! You can catch me wearing it in the video. (comes in a few different color options)

 

Bonus Perk: Meditation has played a large role in my personal development, and it's something I'm passionate about spreading. If you've been curious about meditation or want to deepen your practice, I encourage you to check out these perks. 

Where Your Money Will Go:
Editing: $2,400
Marketing Materials (Promotional graphic designs and templates): $1,000
Book Print Run: $200
10% Donation to World Travelers Association - This money will specifically be used to bring Harol to America. I met Harol while volunteering in Nicaragua. Harol's dream is to come to America to further his education.  With your help, that will be possible!

The Impact
This book will hit home for a lot of people and give them the understanding that they too can change their life at any moment. 

All In
I went all in on quitting my job in order to pursue my dream. Because of this, I've seen what incredible things happen when you go all in. 

That's why I  went all in on this campaign and chose fixed pricing. If I don't hit my goal, I get $0. With your support, I know that won't happen!

I hope you consider and thank you for taking the time. 

With Love,
Lou

story:
Backstory

When I was growing up, I loved the Choose Your Own Adventure series.  

There was something magical and deeply personal about being able to influence the direction of the story and navigate those uncertain and adventurous worlds all on my own. 

The stories in the books became my stories because I could decide what to do. It gave me confidence.

It also had a big influence on me, leading me to the Fighting Fantasy books and to tabletop role playing games. 

I wanted to share this love from my childhood with my young nieces who were just starting to read. 

I looked but I couldn’t find a picture book in the format that was suited to such a young audience.

So I decide to write and publish my own.

I wanted to create a picture book that would give readers the same feeling of autonomy, adventure and uncertainty in a world rich with strong characters and stories that they could relate to. 

What a journey that decision has taken me on.

Since then, I've started Zoot Publishing - an indie publishing house exploring new formats of printed books and games.

Who Ate The Cake? is our first title and the first in the Who series aimed at introducing young readers to the interactive fiction (or game book) format, and to tabletop role playing games.

 

Vision

Our choices define us. 

At Zoot Publishing, we believe being curious and being aware of our choices makes us better people. 

We also love Choose Your Own Adventure  books and want to introduce today's young readers to the interactive fiction format. 

Who Ate The Cake?  is a 45-page hardback picture book for ages 4+ that combines both. 

The book encourages decision-making and curiosity in young readers by taking the reader on adventures in which they drive the story and solve the mystery. 

In the book, the reader is a main character and together with Sophie, sets out to find out what happened to Sophie's missing birthday cake. Along the way, the reader needs to decide where to explore, who to question, and more. 

There are 6 different endings in the book, all of which solve the mystery. So there is no right or wrong choice. Who Ate The Cake? doesn’t try to tell young readers what to decide, but rather lets them practise making their own decisions whilst enjoying the story. 

Understanding we always have a choice, even when there doesn't appear to be one, empowers us as individuals.  It helps us take responsibility for our actions. Combined with exploring, wondering and questioning, we can become people that go on to make a difference.

Over the past 2 years, we've written, illustrated, done a trial print run and market tested the book. 

Now we need your help to officially launch.

The money will go towards another print run and towards promoting the book and its values. 

Join us as we launch Who Ate The Cake? and help young readers grow curious and to remember 'There’s Always a Choice.' 

 

Reviews

My kids are HOOKED! We haven't discovered all 6 endings yet and I don't think my kids will go to sleep until we do - they're still up and begging me to read it one more time! 

~ My Little Bookcase

 

The illustrations are entertaining, colourful and the facial expressions are funny. 

This book is fun, full of adventure and a little bit way out. 

 ~ Melinda Noughton, Creative Kids Tales

 

Perks

 One for you, One for a friend   (Featured Perk - $40 USD)  

2 signed hardback copies of Who Ate The Cake?  PLUS the colouring in book of the illustrations in the book (pdf) and an activities booklet with questions and activities for before, during and after reading  (pdf).

 

Colouring In Book   ($3 USD)

Containing all 45 illustrations from the book. Colour in the illustrations and use them to write your own story or ending. (PDF)

 

 

PLUS Ebook version with accompanying Activities booklet    ($8 USD)

Colouring In book PLUS the Ebook version (epub) with accompanying Activities booklet (pdf). The activities booklet includes questions and activities for before, during and after reading (pdf). The Ebook version is best viewed in iBooks or the Kindle app (not suitable for Kindle devices due to the book dimensions). 

 

PLUS Signed Hardback Copy    ($20 USD)

Colouring In book (pdf) & Ebook version (epub) with accompanying Activities booklet (pdf)  PLUS one signed hardback copy (RRP 24 USD)

 

PLUS Canvas Print  ($30 USD)

Colouring In book (pdf), Ebook version (epub) with accompanying Activities booklet (pdf) & one signed hardback copy PLUS an unframed canvas print of an illustration in the book. You choose the illustration. 

 

PLUS a LED Canvas Print    ($50 USD)

Colouring In book (pdf), Ebook version (epub) with accompanying Activities booklet (pdf), one signed hardback copy & unframed canvas print of an illustration of your choice PLUS a LED Canvas Print of illustrations from the book. Hang the print on the wall.  At night, switch it on to create a magical scene. Choose from Birthday Cake, House of Stars or Brightest Star.

Birthday Cake

 

House of Stars (left) & Brightest Star (right)

 

PLUS a Sophie Table Light   ($70 USD)

Colouring In book (pdf), Ebook version (epub) with accompanying Activities booklet (pdf), one signed hardback copy, unframed canvas print of an illustration of your choice & LED canvas print PLUS a Sophie Table Light to draw, write and create by.

 

 

Complete PERK Set   ($100 USD)

The COMPLETE PERK set includes colouring In book (pdf), Ebook version (epub) with accompanying Activities booklet (pdf), one signed hardback copy, unframed canvas print of an illustration of your choice, all 3 LED canvas prints and Sophie Table Light. 

 

COMPLETE PERK Set PLUS New Book - Let's Play Hide-and-Seek   ($110 USD)

The COMPLETE PERK set which includes colouring In book (pdf), Ebook version with accompanying Activities booklet (pdf), one signed hardback copy, unframed canvas print of an illustration of your choice, all 3 LED canvas prints & Sophie Table Light PLUS a signed earlybird copy of Let's Play Hide-and-Seek - the upcoming title from Cinta and Jade Fang. (RRP 24 USD) 

Join Sophie and the Teddies on another adventure as you play hide-and-seek.

What do you want to do first - hide or seek? Does Greenie Beenie find you? Is that a noise coming from the dress up box? 

Decide where to hide or to look then roll the die to find out what happens next.  

Check out www.letsplayhideandseek.com for more details.

 

Risks & Challenges

We're ready to go! 

We have costs and samples of all the promised perks and have logistics and shipping calculated. 

We have personally met with and selected the factories we'll be working with. 

To minimise risk, we'll also be onsite for the manufacturing and print run to quality check. 

We've also added a generous timeline of 4-6 months to take into account potential delays over the Christmas and Chinese New Year period. 

 

Funds Breakdown

 - 4500 USD will go toward the print run and promotion

 - 2000 USD will go toward the perk production for the canvas prints, LED canvas prints and table lights. 

 - 1000 USD will go towards the video production.

 

The Team

Jacinta (Cinta) Plucinski - Writer, Creator & Producer

Jacinta (Cinta) Plucinski runs Zoot Publishing - an indie publishing house focusing on new formats for printed books and games.

She is a writer and content developer with over 15 years of experience working in Asia, the Americas and Europe.

Jacinta has been the lead online and mobile producer for Discovery Channel in Asia, worked freelance producing interactive audio guides for museums in the Middle East, and interviewed business leaders across Asia, Europe and North America for South China Morning Post.  She also ran events and exhibitions about games for Australia Centre for Moving Image (ACMI), was Digital Producer for SBS in Australia, and is associate partner of Be Movement.

Among her notable achievements she has found a jaguar footprint in Colombia, a 65 million year old fossil in Denmark and lost a staring contest to a boxfish in Indonesia.

She is also a member of HackerFarm in Kamogawa, Japan and experimenting with bio ink with DIYBIO Hong Kong.

 

Jade Fang - Illustrator

Jade Fang started doodling at a very young age and has developed great interest in drawing and painting as a child.  She has been working as an illustrator since 2010 and has worked with several publishers on children’s book projects.

"I’m really fascinated by the many adventurous events that happened in the story. It gave me a lot of room to indulge in my imagination to create the visuals."

Check out her portfolio here

 

Chris (Akiba) Wang - Manufacturing Consultant

 

Akiba is a product designer and manufacturing consultant. He teaches manufacturing to MIT Media Lab design students and manufactures his own designs in Shenzhen, China.

He is one of the founders of Tokyo Hackerspace, helped start Mothership Hackermoms in Oakland, and HackerFarm in Japan.

He's also helping to start a hackerspace in Dharmsala, India, has been a design consultant to UNESCO, Google, and the International Atomic Energy Agency, and was formerly a researcher at Keio University's Sensor Network Lab and Osaka University's Nanotechnology Lab. 

 

Thomas Leung - Video Director @ COSMO

Thomas Leung is an award winning animator and media production professional based in Hong Kong.

He is now the creative director of COSMO, a multimedia production company and creative media consultant agency that handles a wide range of video production, from corporate to educational videos, from news feature stories to on air promos, from viral marketing campaign to 360 VR videos production, the list goes on.

He loves photography and occasionally gives free hugs to Dogs and Cats.

BackstoryWhen I was growing up, I loved the Choose Your Own Adventure series.  There was something magical and deeply personal about being able to influence the direction of the story and navigate those uncertain and adventurous worlds all on my own. The stories in the books became my stories because I could decide what to do. It gave me confidence.It also had a big influence on me, leading me to the Fighting Fantasy books and to tabletop role playing games. I wanted to share this love from my childhood with my young nieces who were just starting to read. I looked but I couldn’t find a picture book in the format that was suited to such a young audience.So I decide to write and publish my own.I wanted to create a picture book that would give readers the same feeling of autonomy, adventure and uncertainty in a world rich with strong characters and stories that they could relate to. What a journey that decision has taken me on.Since then, I've started Zoot Publishing - an indie publishing house exploring new formats of printed books and games.Who Ate The Cake? is our first title and the first in the Who series aimed at introducing young readers to the interactive fiction (or game book) format, and to tabletop role playing games. VisionOur choices define us. At Zoot Publishing, we believe being curious and being aware of our choices makes us better people. We also love Choose Your Own Adventure  books and want to introduce today's young readers to the interactive fiction format. Who Ate The Cake?  is a 45-page hardback picture book for ages 4+ that combines both. The book encourages decision-making and curiosity in young readers by taking the reader on adventures in which they drive the story and solve the mystery. In the book, the reader is a main character and together with Sophie, sets out to find out what happened to Sophie's missing birthday cake. Along the way, the reader needs to decide where to explore, who to question, and more. There are 6 different endings in the book, all of which solve the mystery. So there is no right or wrong choice. Who Ate The Cake? doesn’t try to tell young readers what to decide, but rather lets them practise making their own decisions whilst enjoying the story. Understanding we always have a choice, even when there doesn't appear to be one, empowers us as individuals.  It helps us take responsibility for our actions. Combined with exploring, wondering and questioning, we can become people that go on to make a difference.Over the past 2 years, we've written, illustrated, done a trial print run and market tested the book. Now we need your help to officially launch.The money will go towards another print run and towards promoting the book and its values. Join us as we launch Who Ate The Cake? and help young readers grow curious and to remember 'There’s Always a Choice.'  ReviewsMy kids are HOOKED! We haven't discovered all 6 endings yet and I don't think my kids will go to sleep until we do - they're still up and begging me to read it one more time! ~ My Little Bookcase The illustrations are entertaining, colourful and the facial expressions are funny. This book is fun, full of adventure and a little bit way out.  ~ Melinda Noughton, Creative Kids Tales Perks One for you, One for a friend   (Featured Perk - $40 USD)  2 signed hardback copies of Who Ate The Cake?  PLUS the colouring in book of the illustrations in the book (pdf) and an activities booklet with questions and activities for before, during and after reading  (pdf). Colouring In Book   ($3 USD)Containing all 45 illustrations from the book. Colour in the illustrations and use them to write your own story or ending. (PDF)  PLUS Ebook version with accompanying Activities booklet    ($8 USD)Colouring In book PLUS the Ebook version (epub) with accompanying Activities booklet (pdf). The activities booklet includes questions and activities for before, during and after reading (pdf). The Ebook version is best viewed in iBooks or the Kindle app (not suitable for Kindle devices due to the book dimensions).  PLUS Signed Hardback Copy    ($20 USD)Colouring In book (pdf) & Ebook version (epub) with accompanying Activities booklet (pdf)  PLUS one signed hardback copy (RRP 24 USD) PLUS Canvas Print  ($30 USD)Colouring In book (pdf), Ebook version (epub) with accompanying Activities booklet (pdf) & one signed hardback copy PLUS an unframed canvas print of an illustration in the book. You choose the illustration.  PLUS a LED Canvas Print    ($50 USD)Colouring In book (pdf), Ebook version (epub) with accompanying Activities booklet (pdf), one signed hardback copy & unframed canvas print of an illustration of your choice PLUS a LED Canvas Print of illustrations from the book. Hang the print on the wall.  At night, switch it on to create a magical scene. Choose from Birthday Cake, House of Stars or Brightest Star.Birthday Cake House of Stars (left) & Brightest Star (right)

 
PLUS a Sophie Table Light   ($70 USD)Colouring In book (pdf), Ebook version (epub) with accompanying Activities booklet (pdf), one signed hardback copy, unframed canvas print of an illustration of your choice & LED canvas print PLUS a Sophie Table Light to draw, write and create by.  Complete PERK Set   ($100 USD)The COMPLETE PERK set includes colouring In book (pdf), Ebook version (epub) with accompanying Activities booklet (pdf), one signed hardback copy, unframed canvas print of an illustration of your choice, all 3 LED canvas prints and Sophie Table Light.  COMPLETE PERK Set PLUS New Book - Let's Play Hide-and-Seek   ($110 USD)The COMPLETE PERK set which includes colouring In book (pdf), Ebook version with accompanying Activities booklet (pdf), one signed hardback copy, unframed canvas print of an illustration of your choice, all 3 LED canvas prints & Sophie Table Light PLUS a signed earlybird copy of Let's Play Hide-and-Seek - the upcoming title from Cinta and Jade Fang. (RRP 24 USD) Join Sophie and the Teddies on another adventure as you play hide-and-seek.What do you want to do first - hide or seek? story:
Story of My Book

Infinitely More is a nonfiction book about why senior women leave big jobs and how leaders lose them.

Did you ever wonder why high-powered career women walk away from big jobs and a hefty paycheck? This is a story of a reckoning I didn’t see coming. A journey that forced me to look at my career in Big Law, the impossible choices women like me make to succeed in these pressure cooker jobs, and the catalysts that cause us to leave - and relaunch on our own terms with no regrets.

My name is Amy Conway-Hatcher. I am the author of Infinitely More. I wrote this memoir to offer inspiration that women can take their power back and pivot at any stage of their careers. Many women are exhausted from “doing it all” in spite of significant barriers and lack of support. Playing fields still aren’t level. The gender pay gap is real. Career moms operate at inhuman superhero levels that aren’t sustainable. Even the strongest of women who seem invincible must eventually face tough realities that working around-the-clock and juggling interminable balls in the air doesn’t work long-term. We face hard questions.

  • Do we wait for leaders to wake up and drive change or do we take the reins and lead ourselves?
  • Do we continue to sacrifice for a system that doesn’t offer equal support or do we pivot?
  • Do we really have a seat at that elusive table or do we build our own?


After many years of working 24/7 and having the same old conversations among leaders in my industry, I was lost and burned out. Even “Grit” went on strike saying I was nuts to keep beating my head against that same wall. It wasn’t easy. This tough girl was terrified. Yet, with the vision of some pretty amazing leaders and unexpected heroes (among them being my kids), I mustered the courage to take the reins. I changed direction. You can too.

My hope is that, in reading this book, you see the power of getting back to basics, reconnecting with purpose, and owning your career and your life. Change is not only possible (and scary), it’s invigorating. It is the light on the horizon, the road less traveled, the voice in your head. It is the opportunity flying right next to you... waiting to be seized.

Although this is my story, I know I am not alone in my experiences. This book includes hard lessons and reflections that I hope will open the eyes of leaders to better understand and fix inequities in workplace experiences. It’s not just about upward mobility, but sustainability of the climb. Women are stronger when we are allies and champions for each other. Leaders need a wake-up call. Talk without solid action, ownership, and accountability just doesn’t work. It never has. You’ll learn some examples why there aren’t more women at the table.

In this book, you'll learn about coming to terms with where you are in this moment, celebrations and regrets, reconnecting with purpose, and opening your mind to new possibilities. Here are just a few stories you'll hear about challenges, inequities, and catalyst moments working moms like me face - every day....

  • My life in Big Law was like a precarious high-wire juggling act in the middle of rush hour traffic while trying to avoid being shot at. I am the kind of high-powered lawyer you hire when you are in really big trouble. I’m also a wife and the mom of two amazing kids who bring me both joy and madness. Both jobs are 24/7. You never know what the day will bring..What does that look like, you ask? It was a chilly morning in early 2014. After seven months of commuting to Europe, the team and I were preparing a big presentation. It was “all hands on deck.” My husband left for work early. My young daughter, Olivia, woke up with a stomach ache that quickly turned into a scene from The Exorcist. Although my clothes were covered in God knows what, I still remember stepping between the shoes of “mom-of-sick kid” and “bad-ass warrior lawyer.” Then, out of nowhere, our au pair, followed by the painter, appeared in the doorway just as the pediatrician was calling. In a split second, the universe shifted. The pediatrician told me to get Olivia to the hospital. The au pair needed an emergency root canal. Our painter wanted to give me a “head’s up” that our hallway ceiling had caved in. I texted my team and the client, and put on my superhero mom cape. Handing out credit cards like candy, I remember calling in the cavalry, securing a school pickup for young Jack, and driving to the emergency room whispering to myself over and over: “It’s just another day. You can do it. Balls in the air…”
     
  • Olivia was about a month old and finally napping. Feeling grateful for any quiet time, I jumped when my phone rang unexpectedly. On the line was a very successful, senior male partner in leadership. He wanted to share the news that I’d made it to Big Law equity partner, something he didn’t think had ever been achieved by a woman on maternity leave. He congratulated me and welcomed me to “the club.” Before hanging up, he said with a good-natured laugh, “Welcome to the top of one greasy pole and the bottom of another. You still have a ways to go. Hold on tight.” Then, he was gone - literally and figuratively. Staring at the phone, I thought, “Thank you but, WTF? A greasy pole?!” All those brutal years of working crazy hours, having no limits or balance, and I was at the bottom of a greasy pole? I hated the analogy and found myself wishing for a ladder. The visual wasn’t inspiring to a gal who likes nice clothes and heels. Perhaps well-intentioned, his message made clear that I wasn’t part of the “real club” and the uncertain climb would continue. It would be slippery, dirty and hard. Worse, you could never let go with either hand if you hoped to make it to “the top” (whatever that was). That visual has never left me.
     
  • Years into private practice, I was having cocktails with some male alumni from my prosecutor days. The “banter factor” was high. The guys were talking law firm business referrals and salaries. I’m not usually one to be at a loss for words, but I sat in stunned silence. My salary was roughly half what they were making! Not only didn’t I have a seat at the table, I was clearly paying for the chair some guy was sitting in. After a period of preparation and nursing my wounded ego, I went to speak with someone in Big Law leadership. At a fancy restaurant, he shared that my hard work was highly valued and would pay off down the road. He agreed I was paid under-market. “It must seem unfair,” he said. Then, he shared the law firm had to make choices. My lower salary helped the law firm pay higher salaries to more senior lawyers, even if they weren’t producing the same hours or revenue. “Be patient,” he said, “You’ll get there by fifty.” I tried to keep my jaw from hitting the salad plate. At the pace I was working, I could be dead by then. I wondered if he would have said the same thing to a guy. I left the job and more than doubled my salary in a year. The scary thing? For business and culture reasons, I didn’t even take the highest offer.
     
  • Fast forward to 2020. I met leadership expert and best-selling author Gary Heil. Who knows why he took my calls or what he found so amusing about our debates. What could I possibly have to offer someone of his caliber, I wondered? Turns out I was a worthy adversary, he seemed to enjoy our sparring, and he became my provocateur. In fact, he was the first person to call me on my shit (or at least the first I was willing to listen to). While I wanted to challenge him on the failures of the leadership training industry, he pointed out flaws in my arguments on culture and Big Law. Gary pushed me to think bigger and beyond my comfort zone. In the end, he was right to push back. I couldn’t criticize others for their failure to lead if I wasn’t willing to lead myself. You’ll learn that meeting Gary, among others, was pivotal to my journey, my reckoning, and the direction I took when I reached a crossroads. He seemed to know where I was going before I did. He helped me realize I wasn't alone. And, for that, I'm eternally grateful. 

You will love this book if you:
 
  • Love honest, candid, challenging stories told with grit, heart, and humor
     
  • Are juggling career and motherhood in a non-stop, chaotic world that doesn’t seem to get it
     
  • Are grappling with workplace inequities and wondering if you are alone
     
  • Are considering a career pivot and questioning whether you have the ability to pull it off
     
  • Wonder why businesses lose women leaders and what they are doing wrong
     
  • Wonder what our amazing kids think of our crazy working mom juggling acts


The Book - Infinitely More

Infinitely More is written in several parts. 

You will enter the wild and crazy world of a warrior working mom who moves between battlefields and playgrounds, courtrooms and classrooms, prosecutors and playdates, international air travel and carpool, memos and finger-painting. Believing she is impenetrable, she doesn’t see the ultimate burnout coming – until it does and hits her like a Mack truck. In the weeks and months that follow, she must examine how she arrived at this place, how to survive, and how she will move beyond. Slowly, she musters the courage to tap back into the grit, resourcefulness and resilience she has known for so long. She must overcome fear, rediscover her purpose and explore if another world is possible. With the help of unexpected heroes and leaders, she begins to see opportunity and limitless potential in the unknown. She faces hard lessons. She finds silver linings. She finds another way.

This is a deep, humorous, and inspiring story of the redemption and relaunching of a high-powered rebel career mom whose kids and unexpected heroes won’t let her off the hook.

This book looks at this voyage from many angles:

  • From reflections, to hard lessons, to time lost and silver linings that offer hope
     
  • To overcoming the deeply engrained fear of the unknown
     
  • To moments of reckoning and redemption
     
  • To a vision for the future that is brighter, full of possibility and closely aligned with purpose – and family


I hope you find helpful tools to think about the career you want to build that allow you to fully embrace your life.

Pivots are possible. You have more power than you think.
 


What We Need & What You Get

Before I start, I am not making any money off of this book. Any profits will be donated to charities dedicated to gender equality, supporting women in their career mobility and training the next generations of women leaders. This section is dedicated to upfront costs only.

This book will be published with New Degree Press. I set up the pre-order tiers to help cover the costs for publishing my book. Money raised will go towards the following:

  • The Editor I will work with to revise and publish my manuscript in December 2021.
     
  • The Cover Design of my book. (The mockups you see currently are a placeholder!)
     
  • The Layout Design for the interior of my book (physical copy, ebook formats).
     
  • The Copyediting for my book to polish the grammar and spelling prior to publication.
     
  • The Launch & Promotion Efforts for my book when I ultimately publish this winter.

I am also offering some exclusive rewards for people who pre-order my book now:

You will receive a personally signed copy of my book when I publish and a handwritten thank-you note.

  • Your name will appear in the Acknowledgments section of my book (“with Special Thanks to”).
     
  • You will receive early access to the Introduction and some excerpts from my book, with the opportunity to review it and give me early feedback.
     
  • You will have the opportunity to be involved in selecting my cover and title.
     
  • You will be invited to join my Author Community and get behind-the-scenes sneak peeks into the publishing process.
     
  • I have some bundle perks listed and will have some surprise perks along the way. 
    (You can contact me if you would like to design your own creative bundle perk, and I'll see if it something we can arrange. I make no promises but loved out-of-the-box thinking!)
     
  • And much more!


Campaign Goals

Tier 1: Hit $5,000 and the ebook/softcover editions get published (this is the minimum needed)

Tier 2: Hit $6,000 and the book will get a hardcover edition

Tier 3: Hit $8,000 and we’ll get an audiobook edition.

 

About the Author

Amy Conway-Hatcher is a Partner with Schertler Onorato Mead & Sears, a boutique law firm in Washington, D.C. whose team of prominent lawyers handle a wide range of high-profile complex legal, business and reputational matters. Amy is the kind of lawyer who solves hard problems (the kind people don’t want you to know about like bribery, fraud and harassment) and keeps your name out of the media headlines. She is the first woman Special Counsel for the Commission on Judicial Disabilities & Tenure in Washington, D.C. and serves as a director on the Board of the Women’s Bar Association Foundation.

Amy wrote this book to take charge of her life and career, and to hold herself accountable for supporting her peers and the next generation of women leaders. Another “secret” reason for finishing her book is to avoid being called a hypocrite by her two kids and darling husband who lovingly remind her of her own sage advice to “embrace change,” "overcome fear," “find opportunity in the unknown,” and “take risks.” She’s finally taking her own medicine.

Amy is a recovering 24/7 work-a-holic equity partner in Big Law who now finds time to be the mom she always wanted to be - cheering her kids on in volleyball and chasing them to get off electronics to play with her or to tackle their chores and homework. After all, they convinced her to pivot and spend more time with them! She is a founding member of Chief in Washington, D.C., an elite private membership network dedicated to connecting and supporting executive women. As a member of a number of professional and charity organizations, she is making up for lost time to help women rise, achieve career goals, and thrive in pivots. She's passing on and living the advice a wise woman shared, “Be a voice not an echo.”  

Last, but not least, Amy is developing some hobbies, something she was never able to say with a straight face - until now.

For more information, you can connect with Amy Conway-Hatcher at aconwayhatcher.author@gmail.com and the following social media platforms. Please use #turning point and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press.

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100069929199098
LinkedIn - https://www.linkedin.com/in/amy-conway-hatcher-0802425
Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/amyc_hatcher/
Twitter - https://twitter.com/AmyCHatcher


(Add a photo of yourself to help backer feel more comfortable that you’re a real person. Picture should be 300 x 300 pixels and can be created on Canva.com)

 

International Preorders

For international preorders, please do the following:
 
  • Identify the perk that interests you, e.g. 1 or 2 paperbacks
     
  • Select the pink "Back it" button to "Make a contribution" for the same amount (this choice bypasses the shipping address page)
     
  • Use this form to share your mailing address, so I can calculate the international shipping costs and invoice you for that amount via PayPal/Venmo [https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSf_vwW...
 

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge with publishing a book is delivering the finished book to the backer, specifically my mailing of the book to you. I have eliminated this risk by building into the campaign the mailing and shipping costs of your signed copies to you within each pre-order tier.

The risk of delivering the pre-sale copies of my book is contingent on the publisher we use. I will be working closely with New Degree Press to make sure we get the earliest possible ship date of the signed book copy to you. We will keep all pre-sale backers up-to-date as my book hits each key milestone and publishes. You will know when the copies are expected to ship.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can support, but that doesn't mean you can't get something out of it!

I will reward the top 3 people who refer the most backers at the end of the campaign (30 days). Here's how:

  • At the top of the campaign page, you will see the "share" buttons. Click on the "chain" icon to get a custom link just for you. (Note: don't use the URL in the browser window as it won't work to track referrals and you won't get credit ?)
     
  • Copy that link and paste it on your social media, email it to a friend, or text a fellow book lover.
     
  • When someone clicks on that link and backs the book, you get 1 entry!

Please use #InfinitelyMore and tag me as well as my publisher, New Degree Press, so we can help amplify your efforts!

Tag:

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/amy-conway-hatcher-0802425 /@NewDegreePress
 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100069929199098  /@NewDegreePress
 

Instragram - https://www.instagram.com/amyc_hatcher/@amyc_hatcher / @NewDegreePress
​

Twitter - https://twitter.com/AmyCHatcher / @newDegreePress

Thank you so much for of all of your support, love - and for those of you who nudged me along in this process - your wisdom, advice, humor, wit, prodding, and muscle!

Thanks again,

Amy
